result.execSummary:
The defendant Kyle A Rellinger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kyle A Rellinger
Current: PO Box 11, 100W Clark St, Colby, WI 54421 United States  (Effective: 01-20-2015)
Prior: 109 Callon St; #5, Wausau, WI 54401

Defendant Kyle A Rellinger in court with attorney Mark J Gumz.  Defendant Kyle A Rellinger in custody.  Chad A Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Hendee moves to amend Ct 1 to Misd. Bailjumping, contrary to 946.49(1)(a).  No objection by Atty Gumz.  BY THE OCURT:  Count 1 to be amended as requested.  Atty Hendee states plea agreement.  Atty Gumz agrees.  Defendant enters No Contest plea to Amended Ct 1 and to Ct 2.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.  Court relies on the criminal complaint for a factual basis.  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of Amended Ct 1 and of Ct 2.
Counsel make sentencing arguments.
BY THE COURT:  
Ct 1:  Defendant sentenced to serve 30 days in the Marquette County Jail.  Sentence to commence immediately.  *Pay costs of $243.00.  *Granted 44 days credit for time already served (to be applied to Ct 1 first, then balance towards Ct 2).
Ct 2:  Defendant sentenced to serve 30 days in the Marquette County Jail, consecutive to Ct 1.  Sentence to commence immediately.  *Pay costs of $243.00.

Payment Plan:  $25/month, commencing in June.
Preliminary hearing on April 28, 2014 at 10:45 am.

Defendant Kyle A Rellinger in court with attorney Mark J. Gumz.  Defendant Kyle A Rellinger in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Atty Gumz states that the defendant will waive the time limits.

BY THE COURT:  Time limits waived; set for Prelim.
bond continued.
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2014 at 10:45 am.
